mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (title, contents, date, user_number, view_count) VALUES ( #{title}, #{contents}, SYSDATE(), #{number}, 1 )
mapper.select: SELECT p.title, p.contents, p.view_count, u.name, u.nickname FROM post p JOIN user u ON p.user_number = u.number WHERE p.number = #{postNumber} AND p.user_number = #{ownerNumber}
SELECT c.number, c.comment, c.date, u.name, u.nickname FROM post_comment c JOIN user u ON c.user_number = u.number WHERE c.post_number = #{postNumber}
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET view_count = view_count + 1 WHERE number = #{postNumber}
